field_value: Aveo Healthcare Limited operates five retirement villages in south-east Queensland. They are located in Albany Creek, Clayfield, Cleveland, Durack and Taringa. The facilities cater to a wide range of budgets and needs. The company forms part of Aveo Group, which offers retirement lifestyles in Queensland, New South Wales, Victoria, South Australia and Tasmania. Its retirement communities are situated in various locations including the inner suburbs of Australiaâ€™s major cities, country retreats and coastal resorts. Aveo Healthcare is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales.
